mapper.select:
select hdispatch_schedule.sch_id, hdispatch_schedule.schedule_id, hdispatch_schedule.project_id, hdispatch_schedule.flow_id, hdispatch_schedule.submit_date, hdispatch_schedule.project_name,hwf.theme_id from hdispatch_schedule,hdispatch_workflow hwf where 1=1 and hdispatch_schedule.project_name=hwf.name and ('Y'=hasPermission(hwf.theme_id,#{request.userId},'Y',NULL) OR 'Y'=hasPermission(hwf.theme_id,#{request.userId},NULL,'Y'))
and project_name like CONCAT('%',#{project_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and hdispatch_schedule.flow_id like CONCAT('%',#{flow_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and hdispatch_schedule.submit_date > #{submit_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hdispatch_schedule (sch_id, schedule_id, project_id, flow_id, submit_date,project_name) values (#{sch_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schedule_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{project_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flow_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submit_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{project_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into hdispatch_schedule
sch_id,
schedule_id,
project_id,
flow_id,
submit_date,
#{sch_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{schedule_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{project_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{flow_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{submit_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update hdispatch_schedule
schedule_id = #{schedule_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{project_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flow_id = #{flow_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit_date = #{submit_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sch_id = #{sch_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update hdispatch_schedule set schedule_id = #{schedule_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{project_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_id = #{flow_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_date = #{submit_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name=#{project_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sch_id = #{sch_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
